description: Show the full details of an invoice revisionizing invoice revision.
permissions: Allowed for users who can access the record within the policy scope; access is granted when the invoice revisionizing invoice revision joins to an invoice revisionizing work visible under the InvoiceRevisionizingWork policy scope (non-admins limited to member broker IDs; admins can access all).
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required and must be a non-empty invoice revisionizing invoice revision ID.
